text: Australian Bushland Symphony is a 1949 documentary directed by Ken G. Hall. It deals with Australian wild life in its natural state. Hall had previously used the concept of a "bushland symphony" in his 1932 film, On Our Selection. The film sold to US television. The documentary is also referred to as "Bushland Symphony". ==References== ==External links== *Australian Bushland Symphony at IMDb *Australian Bushland Symphony at National Film and Sound Archive Category:Australian documentary films Category:Australian films
title: Australian Bushland Symphony
